AccountID.description: Your AWS Account ID without dashes.

AWSPartition.description: The AWS partition to use. This should be set to 'aws' for commercial accounts, 'aws-us-gov' for GovCloud accounts, and 'aws-cn' for China accounts.

AuthConfig.description: The configuration for the AWS role delegation.

AWSRegions.description: The configuration for which regions to collect data from.

IncludeOnly.description: Array of AWS regions to include from metrics collection.

IncludeAll.description: Collect data for all AWS regions.

MetricsConfig.description: The configuration for ingesting AWS Metrics into Datadog.

Enabled.description: Enable the infrastructure monitoring Datadog product for this AWS Account. This will enable collecting all AWS metrics in your account.

AutomuteEnabled.description: Enable EC2 automute for AWS metrics

TagFilters.description: The array of EC2 tags (in the form key:value) defines a filter that Datadog uses when collecting metrics from EC2.

IncludeOnly.description: Array of AWS namespaces to include from metrics collection. Only one of IncludeOnlyNamespaces or ExcludeNamespaces can be set.

ExcludeOnly.description: Array of AWS namespaces to exclude from metrics collection. Only one of IncludeOnlyNamespaces or ExcludeNamespaces can be set.

AccountTags.description: Array of tags (in the form key:value) to add to all hosts and metrics reporting through this integration.

ResourcesConfig.description: The configuration for ingesting AWS Resources into Datadog.

CSPMResourceCollection.description: Enable the compliance and security posture management Datadog product. This will enable collecting information on your AWS resources and providing security validation.

ExtendedResourceCollection.description: Enable collecting information on your AWS resources for use in Datadog products such as Network Process Monitoring.

LogsConfig.description: The configuration for ingesting AWS Logs into Datadog.

LambdaForwarder.description: The configuration for Lambda Log Forwarders.

Lambdas.description: List of Datadog Lambda Log Forwarder ARNs

Sources.description: List of AWS services that will send logs to the Datadog Lambda Log Forwarder.

TracesConfig.description: The configuration for ingesting AWS Traces into Datadog.

XRayServices.description: The services to collect X-Ray traces from.

IncludeOnly.description: Array of services to collect traces for.

Id.description: Unique Datadog ID of the AWS Account Integration Config. To get the config ID for an account, use the [List all AWS integrations](https://docs.datadoghq.com/api/latest/aws-integration/#list-all-aws-integrations) endpoint and query by AWS Account ID.

ExternalIDSecretName.description: The name of the AWS SecretsManager secret created in your account to hold this integration's `external_id`. Defaults to `DatadogIntegrationExternalID`. Cannot be referenced from created resource.
